text: Shockat Hussain Adam Patel (born November 1972) is a British businessman, optometrist, and independent politician. He has been a Member of Parliament for Leicester South since 2024. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:British activists Category:Living people Category:People from Leicester Category:UK MPs 2024â€“present Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Malawian politicians Category:Independent politicians in the United Kingdom
